effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to activate Luck of the Draw! causing you to cast Fortifying Brew for 6.0 sec. Your damage done is increased by 15% for 8 sec after Luck of the Draw! activates.
Set: When you gain  Luck of the Draw!, your next 2 casts of Blackout Kick deal 250% increased damage and incur a 2.0 sec reduced cooldown.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

spells.description:
Equip: Taking damage has a chance to grant you an Adrenal Surge, causing you to gain 2,591 Agility and lose 310 Mastery for 12 sec.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.

spells.description: Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Conjure a Spectral Scythe, dealing 1.3 million Shadow damage to your target and 187,552 Shadow damage in a 15 yd cone to enemies behind your target. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Use: Summon Pitbot Geardo to assist you for 5 sec, coating nearby enemies with rancid motor oil for additional threat. Geardo ensures you take the blame.

Geardo departs explosively to deal 1 million Fire damage split between nearby enemies, increased by 15% if recently oiled. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)
Equip: Don the mantle of the Trashmaster.

Equip: Gain a high chance to follow up your attacks with a fiery gilded uppercut, dealing 271,724 Fire damage to your target. Molten gold continues to splatter to deal 75,479 Fire damage over 5 sec to all nearby enemies. Damage reduced beyond 8 enemies.
